speech: Hello! Ready to place a new order? Just say something like "I want two Pizzas and one Falafel," making sure to include the quantity for each item. To check an existing order, say "Track Order." Our menu features Butter Chicken, Spaghetti Carbonara, Tacos, Sushi, Pad Thai, French Onion Soup, Pizza, Falafel, and Goulash. What’s tempting you today?
